page.title: 04Nursery Gardens-Dorking NE
page.content: We went to two nursery gardens and saw the difference between them .Surrey is a good place for these because many people are rich and have{big houses {and gardens}so they need plants and shrubs.The nurseries are near London and one of them is on a main road which will encourage people to come in.This one employs{6 full time {workers,4 part time}and one summer student.They buy all their {herbaceous,bedding and house plants from Kent and their shrubs and herbs from Chelmsford.They also sell garden furniture,peat and fencing. The other nursery employs{8 workers all part time.Eve Wood took us round.She has regular customers and gives personal service.They only sell {bedding plants}and grow everything from seed.They sometimes cut flowers from what they grow.They are friendly.
